items.title: Queer Sci-Fi with a Pinch of Romance and Some Sweet Revenge
items.description: Prepare for big feelings, a lot of violence, a little bit of romance, and a satisfying dose of revenge.

items.title: Kamala Harris’s New Memoir—Plus The Best BIPOC Books Out This Week
items.description: More BIPOC lit news, plus surreal stories and a realistic view of Brazil's social classes.

items.title: Why Pick One Genre When You Can Have More?
items.description: These genre-blending books include historical fiction + mystery mashups, sci-fi horror blends, fantasy + noir reads, and more.

items.title: 18 New August Romances for Romance Awareness Month
items.description: This list of new romance releases was initially twice as long, but I narrowed it down! Here are 18 romances to read in August 2025.

items.title: End of Summer Sleuthing: 10 New Mystery & Thrillers for August 2025
items.description: Pick up these new mysteries & thrillers this August, from a new series starter from Karin Slaughter to a murder mystery set on a train.
